title: Big Caslon italic
content:
Hi,

i'm doing a magazine and i wanted to use Big Caslon italic as a display font because of it swashes and elegance in bigger sizes, compared to adobe caslon pro italic.  
Anyone knows if it is still wallpaper's exclusive font?  
Can i buy it anywhere? Or can you think of any alternative fonts?

And do you know an elegant dingbats font i could use with it? i need an elegant pointing hand...

than you,

jonas
author: jreker

comments.content:
I \_believe\_ the swash italic isn't available yet, but I'm pretty sure the regular italic is. See [http://www.carterandcone.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012212059/http:/www.carterandcone.com/ "http://www.carterandcone.com/") for contact info.

You could also look at Caslon 540 with swashes:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/caslon-no-540/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012212059/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/caslon-no-540/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/caslon-no-540/")
